mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT B.categoryid, A.productname, A.productprice, A.prodimgurl, A.productid FROM (SELECT p.productid, p.productname, p.productprice, i.prodimgurl, p.categoryid FROM product p, productimage i WHERE p.productid = i.productid AND p.parentpid is null) A, category B WHERE B.categoryid = A.categoryid AND A.categoryid = ${categoryID}
SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM product WHERE categoryid = ${categoryID} AND parentpid is null
